block.p: FRISCHLING-Anna. Died at home in Florida after a long illness at age 86. Beloved wife for 66 years of Irving. Devoted mother of Rosely, Carl and Adele, Steven and Ruth, and the late Eleanor. Loving grandmother of Nica and Rob, William and Amy, Amos, James, Teddy, Estee, Menucha, Yael, and Sholom. Caring great grandmother of Jake, Stevie, and Robert. Private family graveside services. Receiving family and friends Friday, October 6, 12:303:30 at 92nd Street Y, Room 101.
